name: Company's Life
description:
This is my first story based game I ever made. It was made on Gamemaker 8.1

This is what introduced me to the world of gamedevelopment.

In this top-down shooter game you need to save the world from the greed of a big company called Sitetech. The company is all in for power and money and doesn't care about the lives it costs. You need to stop the company before life as we know it dissapears forever.
